price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߕߍ߫ ߡߣߊ߬ߡߣߊ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߞߎ߲߬ߞߏ߬ߕߐ߬ߦߊ߬ߞߊ߲߫ ߡߍ߲߫ ߠߊ߫ ߦߋ߲߬
arabic: لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغۡوٗا وَلَا تَأۡثِيمًا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: lā yasmaʿūna fīhā laghwan walā tathīman
